reviewtext: I've used this product for almost 6 years now and have noticed no problems or degradation of video signal or response time.I'm using it with a Flat screen monitor and 2 PCs.  One of the pcs is my web/email machine and the other is a gaming machine.  The CTRL CTRL mechanism for switching between pcs works great and has only been a problem in some games where CTRL is used for something else.  I'd say this has occurred less than 2% of the time though.The only thing that I would like to see is the addition of speaker support, but that really isn't in any of the KVM switch products.
summary: Excellent product that will save you space!
